record.title: Mr. WARNER. Mr. President, I ask that I be made a cosponsor of that resolution.

speaking.paragraph:
Mr. President, I ask that I be made a cosponsor of that resolution. -- (Senate - July 13, 2007)

[Page: S9225]
Mr. President, I ask that I be made a cosponsor of that resolution.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
